translation.xylellaFastidiosaDescription: 1 - highly tolerant; 5 - highly susceptible; N.D - no data.

translation.fattyAcidProfileDescription: 1 - highly tolerant; 5 - highly susceptible; N.D - no data.
translation.phenolicProfileDescription: 1 - highly tolerant; 5 - highly susceptible; N.D - no data.
translation.volatileProfileGreenNotesDescription: 1 - Light green hints (e.g., almond, apple); 5 - Strong and dominant green sensations (e.g., artichoke, olive leaf)
translation.volatileProfileFruitIntensityDescription: 1 - soft and subtle fruitiness; 5 - very aromatic, robust fruitiness
translation.oilYieldDescription: 1 - low oil content; 5 - high oil content; N.D. - no data.
translation.floweringLoadDescription: 1 - low flowering load; 5 - high flowering load; N.D - no data.
translation.fruitLoadDescription: 1 - low fruit load; 5 - high fruit load; N.D - no data.
translation.fruitDetachmentResistanceDescription: 1 - low fruit detachment resistance ; 5 - high fruit detachment resistance; N.D - no data.
translation.fruitAverageWeightDescription: 1 - low fruit weight ; 5 - high fruit weight; N.D - no data.
translation.budburstTimeDescription: 1 - early budburst; 5 - late budburst; N.D. - no data.
translation.floweringTimeDescription: 1 - early flowering; 5 - late flowering; N.D. - no data.
translation.ripeningTimeDescription: 1 - early ripening; 5 - late ripening; N.D. - no data.
translation.coldToleranceDescription: 1 -  highly tolerant; 5 - highly susceptible; N.D - no data.
translation.droughtToleranceDescription: 1 -  highly tolerant; 5 - highly susceptible; N.D - no data.
translation.fruitVolumeDescription: 1 - low fruit volume; 5 - high fruit volume; N.D. - no data.
translation.fruitWidthDescription: 1 - low fruit width; 5 - high fruit width; N.D. - no data.
translation.fruitLengthDescription: 1 - low fruit length; 5 - high fruit length; N.D. - no data.
translation.fruitBruisingIndexDescription: 1 - low fruit bruising index; 5 - high fruit bruising index; N.D. - no data.
translation.fruitShapeIndexDescription: 1 - low fruit shape index; 5 - high fruit shape index; N.D. - no data. The shape index is calculated as the ratio between the length and width (mm).
